data.text:
Woah! I've finally found it! 
This is the perfect gift for them…!
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
Haa… I wasn't able to break the icicle off… 
It looked so cool, too… And it's as big as a brown bear…
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
But an icicle would melt… Santa-san wouldn't give them something 
like this… Ugh, now I'm back to square one. I couldn't find 
anything inside of me, or my clothes.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: Maarveeloous ☆ ★

Kyahaha! Mayano, don't throw so hard! 
And throw with more marvelousness ☆ ★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Marvelousness? Okay, how about this!? 
Sexy… Maverick Snowball! Take off ♪
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
Hya, that's so cold…! Yet so warm ☆ 
So marvelously unbalanced ★ Winter is so marvelous ☆ ★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
It's starting to get so warm! 
Let's take off our coats ♪ Ahaha ☆
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text: You two are…
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: Oh, it's Oguri-san! Hello♪
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text: Good Marvelous ☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Hello. Wait, why are you two here? Don't tell me you two come out 
all the way here for a snowball fight…?
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
Nope! You see… 
We came here hoping to find a miracle!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text: A miracle?
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
Yup ♪ Christmas is when miracles happen ☆ 
So dazzling, so heart-racing, so marvelous ★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Yup! So based on Marve-chin's marvelous hunch and my intuition, 
we figured we'd find a miracle somewhere around here ♪
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
Then we found all this snow! 
It was so much fun to play with ♪
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text: Isn't that right ♪
data.name: Mayano & Marvelous

data.text:
So that's what happened. You two really do have great intuition. 
Surely you can find plenty of miracles in the snowy mountains. 
Like icicles the size of brown bears…
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
Ehh!? That sounds so cool! Actually, we 
just found this huge sled tipped over!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
A sled!? Sleds are the perfect allies of winter, carrying huge 
amounts of food! Where was it? I want to see it too!
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: We're fine with that, but are you okay?
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
There's blue and purple mist all around you… 
I wonder if it's food. With yummy-looking sparkles 
mixed in, it's making me all dizzy☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Yummy-looking sparkles…? if you're talking about snow, you 
shouldn't eat that, even if it looks like shaved ice…
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
You've been scolded for doing that, haven't you… 
Wait, that's not the point! Marve-chin was wondering 
if anything was bothering you is all!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text: Ah! I see…! Well, actually…
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
I get it! So, Oguri-san, you want to become 
Santa-san, don't you ♪ How wonderful ☆
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
But what do I do about the present…? 
I've been thinking about it a lot, but nothing seems to work.
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
Hmm… ☆ 
By the way, Oguri, those clothes…
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Ahh, these were also Christmas presents that I got from my fans. 
They put their hearts and souls into designing this for me so 
that I could do my best in my upcoming races…
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
I really appreciate the thought that they put into this… 
And that's why I want to give them… 
something only I could give…
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: Ahh… I think I get it ☆
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text: Ehh…
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
Don't tell me, is what you're thinking super dazzling and 
marvelous? If so, I think we're on the same page. ☆ ★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Of course we are, Marve-chin! 
That's the only way, right♪
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
That? Marvelous…? 
What are you two talking about? Tell me, please!
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
Oguri-san, the only choice is… 
to have you become Santa-san ☆
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text: Wh-What do you mean…?
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text: Exactly what we said ♪
data.name: Mayano & Marvelous

data.text: (Rumble…)

Nngh, my stomach… I guess it's almost time for dinner. Which 
means the party's going to start soon…!
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
Thank you both for your advice! 
I'll go and get ready to become Santa…!
data.name: Oguri Cap

data.text:
Hey, Marve-chin… 
I've got an idea…
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
Aha, me too! If we follow Oguri… 
it'll be so much fun, right ☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Marve-chin, we had the same idea! 
Now, change course! We're going to follow Oguri-san…
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text: (Fuwaah…)
Hyaa, it's so cold!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text: Woah! ☆ It started snowing! ★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
